name: Reclaiming Ownership with Music NFTs with Dyl - W3CS S1.E4

{"name": "Reclaiming Ownership with Music NFTs with Dyl - W3CS S1.E4 1/25", "description": "The Web3 Creator Show Season 1 Episode 4 welcomes Dylan Rhodes, known as Dyl. Dyl is a Multi-Platinum awarded recording artist and entrepreneur from Philadelphia, PA. Dyl gained recognition in 2015 with the success of Multi-Platinum hit single b�Jordan Belfortb� and accompanying tour performing 50+ shows across the US. Dyl is a pioneer of crypto and Music NFTs, with his debut album "Crypto Rich" making a major impact in the Web3 Music community and becoming one of the top selling independent Music NFT albums.
